definitions.definition: The process that converts sugars into caramel ; the process of caramelizing .
The browning of sugars by heat.
examples: Slowly cooking the onions will cause caramelization which will bring out the sweetness and give them a brown color.

main_definition: ( cooking ) The process that converts sugars into caramel ; the process of caramelizing .
secondary_definitions: ( cooking ) The browning of sugars by heat.
